::KitKat:;

She looked at Drillbit and smiled. "I'd love to. But I have to face 
Megatron first.  He's rather mad at me and I have to stand up to him 
like a warrior should.  When that is done..." She looked at him and 
smiled.  She kissed him and walked over to Megatron and stood in 
front of Megatron, seeing the anger in his face.  


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> DrillBit dodged the missile, that AirBomber shot, before he leaft.
> "Damn you! We just gave you your life!" He yells, seeling of the 
door.
> He walked to Land Mine.
> "Ok, whatever. How about you go check on him, ok?" He asked.
> He didn't wait for a response, he walked over to KitKat.
> "Wanna go... you know?" He asked.
> "Wile we have a break in the war." He stated.
